jd: From: Ashwini Sithar, Propelsys ashwini@propelsys.com Reply to: ashwini@propelsys.com HiHope you are doing well We have urgent requirements with our Implementation partner for the below requirement Oracle Cloud ArchitectLocation : Chicago, ILWorking model : Hybrid (3 days office) + 2 days WFHJDAWS & Java Architect---------------------------------------------------------------------Experience: 15+ years in java and open source technologies and 4-5 years as an AWS Architect role Must have:Certification - AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate or ProfessionalProficiency Java J2EE, Proficiency in Spring bootProficiency in Spring Cloud Stack or any other microservices platforms such as Cloud FoundryShould have experience on REST web services, Spring, JPA/Hibernate/IBATIS, any Cache framework, MQ frameworkExperience in DynamoDB, Glue, Kinesis, Athena, Lambda, Cognito, IAM, VPC, Cloud Formation, ECS, Faregate etc.Experience with any 2 estimation methods (MVCP, UCP, FP, COCOMO, WBS etc.)Should have worked with any 2 databases (Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, Cassandra etc.)Familiar with DevOps implementationAbility to recommend multiple end-to-end solutions with pros and cons for every aspectExperience and good knowledge in architectural and design patternsInnovative and curious to learn and understand the new / latest technologiesAble to work in a team and take ownership of tasksExcellent communication and interpersonal skills, must have played customer facing roles Good to have:Experience in any frontend technology like Angular, React, PHP etc.Experience on any 1 of these frameworks (Apache Camel, RedHat Fuse, Alfresco, JBPM/Activiti, DROOLS)Experience on DevOps using tools such as AWS DevOps tools, Jenkins, Bamboo, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible etc.)Good knowledge and experience on AWS services such as AWS Data Lake, RedShift, S3,
